text: miru custunnaru kada! Ayana akasalanu sthambhalu lekundane srstincadu. Mariyu bhumilo parvatalanu natadu, adi mito patu kadalakunda undalani; mariyu danilo prati rakamaina pranini nivasimpajesadu. Mariyu memu akasam nundi nitini kuripinci, danilo rakarakala sresthamaina (padarthalanu) utpatti cesamu
